name: Castle Rush (cchuge)
description:
Castle Rush is my first game.

This is a simple tower defense game.

It is playable on PC, you can download from this link:sss

I used the 3D models and character art assets from my other works.

My characters, a cactus, a mushroom girl and a rock giant are the enemies.

The castle is made by Maya, I seperate the castle into many parts.
